description: Harmonists receive anonymous insights on techniques to reduce BCI's flag sensitivity and initiate a strategic dialogue with Civil Reformers.
Preliminary adjustments to BCI protocols are discreetly applied in controlled areas, observing positive outcomes in service stability.
Authorities announce a temporary reduction in BCI's flag sensitivity, intending to alleviate pressure on public services and restore confidence.
Harmonists and Civil Reformers hold a collaborative meeting aimed at long-term BCI recalibration to balance automation with human oversight.
Expanded testing of modified BCI protocols across select districts showcases tangible improvements in service consistency.
A joint public statement confirms ongoing efforts to reduce BCI's impact on citizens' daily lives, highlighting signs of systemic recovery.
Noticeable recovery in public service operations calms protestors, paving the path for open forums and civil discussions.
